title: About Job Preferences
content: What type of roles or job titles are you specifically looking for?

options.content: I love my last job title, I'm looking for similar roles
I'm looking for a new challenge, I'm open to new roles
I'm looking for a promotion, I'm looking for higher roles

title: About Job Preferences
content: Do you have a preferred industry or sector you would like to work in?

options.content: The last industry I worked in
I don't mind, I'm open to new industries

title: About Job Preferences
content: What company size do you prefer working in: small startups, medium-sized companies, or large corporations?

options.content: Small startups, it feels like a family
Medium-sized companies, it's a good balance
Large corporations, it's more stable

title: About Job Preferences
content: Which job sector are you particularly interested in?

options.content: Government or public sector, I want to serve the community
Non-profit organization,  I want to make a difference
Private sector, I want to grow my career
I don't mind, I'm open to new opportunities

title: About Work Environment
content: How important is company culture to you, and what aspects of culture do you value the most?

options.content: Collaboration and Teamwork: Emphasizing the importance of working in a cooperative and communicative environment where people work well together.
Innovation and Growth: Valuing a culture that encourages creativity, continuous learning, and professional development.
Inclusivity and Respect: Preferring a workplace where diversity is celebrated, and everyone is treated with respect and dignity.

title: About Work Environment
content: Do you prefer remote work, on-site work, or a hybrid work model?

options.content: Remote work
On-site work
Hybrid work model

title: About Salary, Compensation and Benefits
content: What are your salary expectations, and are there specific benefits or perks that are particularly important to you?

options.content: I look for competitive salary
I look for good benefits
I look for stable income

title: About Salary, Compensation and Benefits
content: Are you open to contract or temporary roles, or are you solely looking for full-time permanent positions?

options.content: Full-time permanent positions
I don't mind contract or temporary roles
I prefer part-time or casual roles

title: Company Preference
content: Are you more interested in local or foreign-based companies?

options.content: Foreign-based companies
Local companies, I want to support local businesses
I don't mind, I'm open to new opportunities

title: About Location and Commute
content: How much commute time are you willing to handle daily?

options.content: keep it under 30 minutes
Up to 1 hour is manageable
I donâ€™t mind longer commute if the job is right
